Struct Quad

Namespace
ShapeEngine.Core.Shapes
Assembly
ShapeEngine.dll

Points should be in CCW order (A -> B -> C -> D)

SetTransform(Transform2D)

Moves the quad to transform.Position Rotates the moved quad to transform.RotationRad Sets the size of the rotated quad to transform.Size.Width
